fulfilled_at.description: The date and time when the fulfillment was completed

request_status.description: The status of any requests associated with the fulfillment order

fulfill_by.description: The deadline by which the fulfillment must be completed

fulfillment_holds.description: Details of any holds on the fulfillment

reason_notes.description: Additional notes regarding the hold on the fulfillment

reason.description: The reason for the hold on the fulfillment

fulfill_at.description: The date and time when the fulfillment is scheduled to occur

destination.description: Details of the destination where the order is to be fulfilled

zip.description: The postal code of the destination

phone.description: The phone number of the recipient at the destination

address2.description: The secondary address of the destination

address1.description: The primary address of the destination

last_name.description: The last name of the recipient at the destination

company.description: The name of the company at the destination

id.description: The unique identifier of the destination

first_name.description: The first name of the recipient at the destination

email.description: The email address of the recipient at the destination

created_at.description: The date and time when the fulfillment order was created

line_items.description: Details of the line items in the fulfillment order

fulfillment_order_id.description: The identifier of the fulfillment order

shop_id.description: The identifier of the shop where the line item belongs

quantity.description: The quantity of the line item

variant_id.description: The identifier of the product variant

line_item_id.description: The identifier of the line item in the order

fulfillable_quantity.description: The quantity that can be fulfilled

inventory_item_id.description: The identifier of the inventory item associated with the line item

id.description: The unique identifier of the line item

shop_id.description: The identifier of the shop that created the fulfillment order

updated_at.description: The date and time when the fulfillment order was last updated

shop_url.description: The URL of the shop associated with the fulfillment order

delivery_method.description: Details of the delivery method for the fulfillment order

min_delivery_date_time.description: The minimum expected delivery date and time

id.description: The unique identifier of the delivery method

max_delivery_date_time.description: The maximum expected delivery date and time

admin_graphql_api_id.description: The unique identifier of the fulfillment order in the Admin GraphQL API

id.description: The unique identifier of the fulfillment order

assigned_location_id.description: The unique identifier of the assigned location

order_id.description: The identifier of the order associated with the fulfillment

channel_id.description: The ID of the channel that created an order

supported_actions.description: Actions supported for the fulfillment order

external_url.description: The external URL associated with the action

international_duties.description: Details of any international duties associated with the fulfillment order

assigned_location.description: The location to which the fulfillment order is assigned

zip.description: The postal code of the assigned location

country_code.description: The country code of the assigned location

province.description: The province of the assigned location

city.description: The city of the assigned location

phone.description: The phone number of the assigned location

address2.description: The secondary address of the assigned location

address1.description: The primary address of the assigned location

name.description: The name of the assigned location

location_id.description: The unique identifier of the assigned location

merchant_requests.description: Details of any requests made by the merchant regarding the fulfillment order

request_options.description: Additional options provided with the merchant request

notify_customer.description: Whether to notify the customer regarding the request

kind.description: The type of request made by the merchant

id.description: The unique identifier of the merchant request

message.description: The message included with the merchant request

status.description: The current status of the fulfillment order
